backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with a pushLive method that performs no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and content files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes with global theming.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entry point into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ValentinePage and triggers optional pushLive behavior via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Closin: Closing section with Yes button and a movable No button constrained within its container.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Confet: Canvas animation that bursts falling confetti for a short timed duration.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Cursor: Canvas-based particle system generating drifting heart particles following cursor or touch.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Generates floating heart images that animate upward with random positions and timings.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Hero section displaying background imagery, title, subtitle, and a scroll CTA with decorative hearts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveLe: Renders a love letter section using content from valentineContent with styled text and a decorative heart image.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memory: Displays an uploadable photo grid with captions, allowing up to five images and managing uploads via FileReader.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Playli: Shows a playlist section with title, subtitle, and an embedded Spotify playlist from valentineContent.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reason: Renders a grid of cards listing reasons from valentineContent.reasons with heart icons and animations.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Provides a layout wrapper component that applies consistent section padding and max-width styling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Separa: Displays a special message section with paragraphs from valentineContent and decorative animated emojis.
frontend/src/components/valentine/SweetR: Modal dialog showing a closing response message using valentineContent with animated heart emoji.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Assembles all Valentine sections, manages the response modal state, and triggers floating hearts on CTA click.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Virtua: Handles an interactive gift box that reveals coupon content after an animation with optional confetti.
frontend/src/content/valentineContent.ts: Central content config storing all text, titles, captions, and options used throughout the Valentine page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking through an AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushLiveOnDemand.t: Checks for a pushLive query param and triggers actor.pushLive() once when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, Valentine-themed color variables, fonts, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, animations, fonts, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s configuration, feature requirements, design notes, and known issues for the Valentine website.
